Create a personalized oral care routine app that integrates with electric toothbrushes to provide customized brushing instructions and track progress.
Develop a smart electric toothbrush with built-in AI technology that can analyze and provide feedback on brushing habits and oral health.
Create an electric toothbrush with a removable and reusable brush head that can be customized with different bristle types and textures for different users.
Develop an electric toothbrush with a built-in ultraviolet light that can kill bacteria and viruses in the mouth, providing an extra layer of protection against oral health issues.
Create an electric toothbrush with a built-in timer and pressure sensor that can remind users to brush for the recommended two minutes and provide feedback on brushing pressure to prevent gum damage.
